introduction.speaker: moro
introduction.text: The World Bank will not let us off. Anyone knows what we can do?

introduction.speaker: moro
introduction.text: Looks like we have to start from zero.

introduction.speaker: jesse
introduction.text: Wrong! What about our debts! We are starting from negative!

introduction.speaker: moro
introduction.text: Jesse.. Thanks for helping me. I really appreciate it! I.. Friends in need are friends indeed.

introduction.speaker: lu
introduction.text: Don't think too much! Cheer up now and start making money!

introduction.speaker: tilum
introduction.text: It's okay. Don't worry! Every dog has his day. If something is yours, it will come back sooner or later.

introduction.speaker: tilum
introduction.text: It's not easy to revive the glory of the clan, but I will help you..

introduction.speaker: daisy
introduction.text: Good call! Dinando. With a charming person like me, those debts will be gone in no time.

introduction.speaker: daisy
introduction.text: After this, after the clan is revived, you must invite me to the royal family's party..

introduction.speaker: sal
introduction.text: Dinando! Don't forget you still have me.

introduction.speaker: sal
introduction.text: In this turbulent world, we will still stick to our principle..

introduction.speaker: moro
introduction.text: Okay. I get it. I understand. Anyway, we need to start getting out of debt now..

introduction.speaker: moro
introduction.text: Alright! I will have a plan. I hope everyone will help me on this.

introduction.speaker: moro
introduction.text: We have to hurry up to make some money. We need to be prepared for the debt collectors.

introduction.speaker: jesse
introduction.text: Let's stop any further speech. No matter what we are going to do, we better start doing it now.

introduction.speaker: moro
introduction.text: Right! We will pay off all the debt! Let's work hard and aim for zero debt!

work-in-progress.text: I have already accepted another work.. I should go to ${name} now..
